body:
'develop-' in the version string.  The versions from the HDF5 code were not
matching because 'develop-' is not part of the HDF5 version.  Also, the
develop-x.x versions in spack omit the release version (third) number
because the branch spans all of the release versions.

Currently hdf5 spack versions develop-1.10, develop-1.12 and develop-1.13 will fail testing with spack test hdf5 and with spack install --test={root,all} because the HDF5 code does not include 'develop-' in the versions.
title: Add changes to test functions for checking spack versions of hdf5 with
